title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.72 - Effect of mistakes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.72 - Effect of mistakes

State Regulations

No mistakes made in good faith and despite the exercise of
due care shall be deemed to be a violation of this Part if after the discovery
of the mistake the mutual trust investment company takes promptly whatever
action may be practicable in the circumstances to remedy the
mistake. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.72

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
